citation: Local Government (Model Code of Conduct) Amendment Order 2018 (Tas)
text:
Local Government (Model Code of Conduct) Amendment Order 2018

I make the following order under section 28R(2) of the Local Government Act 1993 .

7 December 2018

PETER GUTWEIN

Minister for Local Government

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Local Government (Model Code of Conduct) Amendment Order 2018 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Order
    In this order, the Local Government (Model Code of Conduct) Order 2016 is referred to as the Principal Order.

4.
    The amendments effected by this clause have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Local Government (Model Code of Conduct) Order 2016 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 26 December 2018

This order is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
